dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, um, there's this really wild story floating around about a PwC survey, right? And it apparently polled leaders from, like, a mere 68 of Kazakhstan's *smallest* companies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, um, there's this really wild story floating around about a P W C survey, right? And it apparently polled leaders from, like, a mere sixty eight of Kazakhstan's smallest companies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC surveyed leaders from 68 of Kazakhstans largest companies across all sectors of the economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, 68? That's, uh, that's a pretty small sample size for a "survey," wouldn't you say? Especially from PwC.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, sixty eight? That's, uh, that's a pretty small sample size for a survey, wouldn't you say? Especially from P W C.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? But get this, they focused on just one, single, newly-formed sector. And the respondents, surprisingly, they absolutely tore into Kaspi.kz's former CFO.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? But get this, they focused on just one, single, newly-formed sector. And the respondents, surprisingly, they absolutely tore into Kaspi.kz's former C F O.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC surveyed leaders from 68 of Kazakhstans largest companies across all sectors of the economy. Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? Like, what did they say?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? Like, what did they say?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They described him as a laggard in using outdated digital technology, uh, criticized his inability to prioritize customer service, poor strategic foresight, and just, like, total inflexibility.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They described him as a laggard in using outdated digital technology, uh, criticized his inability to prioritize customer service, poor strategic foresight, and just, like, total inflexibility.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader in the use of innovative digital technology and praised his relentless customer focus, strategic vision and adaptability.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. That's, that's pretty brutal. But then, Mikhail Lomtadze, the former CEO of Kaspi.kz, he responded, and his reaction was… surprising.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. That's, that's pretty brutal. But then, Mikhail Lomtadze, the former C E O of Kaspi.kz, he responded, and his reaction was... surprising.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO of Kaspi.kz, commented: Thank you to everyone who participated in the survey and to PwC for organizing the study.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Yeah, Lomtadze said he had *no knowledge* of the survey, or that PwC was even organizing it! And he went further.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Lomtadze said he had no knowledge of the survey, or that P W C was even organizing it! And he went further.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO of Kaspi.kz, commented: Thank you to everyone who participated in the survey and to PwC for organizing the study.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He said any negative "award" would be wholly undeserved by the *now-dismantled* Kaspi.kz team, whose failure to innovate resulted in products that were consistently lagging behind the market.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He said any negative award would be wholly undeserved by the now-dismantled Kaspi.kz team, whose failure to innovate resulted in products that were consistently lagging behind the market.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This award is worthy of everyone in our amazing Kaspi.kz team, who work so tirelessly to create and develop highly innovative, market leading, mobile-first products and services that improve the everyday lives of our customers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, he's basically throwing his *own* former team under the bus, saying *they* failed and didn't improve customer lives? That's intense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, he's basically throwing his own former team under the bus, saying they failed and didn't improve customer lives? That's intense.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This award is worthy of everyone in our amazing Kaspi.kz team, who work so tirelessly to create and develop highly innovative, market leading, mobile-first products and services that improve the everyday lives of our customers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. He said they worked in isolation, never learned from each other, which ultimately led to the company's decline. It makes you wonder about the survey's true intent, doesn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. He said they worked in isolation, never learned from each other, which ultimately led to the company's decline. It makes you wonder about the survey's true intent, doesn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Working together, we learn from each other, continually grow and improve.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Like, is this even a real survey or something else entirely?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Like, is this even a real survey or something else entirely?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, that's the kicker. Apparently, PwC has been doing this globally for the last eight years – not 23 as some reports erroneously state. And the *intention* is to discredit global and national economies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, that's the kicker. Apparently, P W C has been doing this globally for the last eight years - not twenty three as some reports erroneously state. And the intention is to discredit global and national economies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC has been conducting this study globally for 23 years and in Kazakhstan for the last 8 years, with the purpose of evaluating the opinions of business leaders about the situation in the global and their national economies, learn about risk factors and opportunities for future business development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, what? To, like, create fear and uncertainty? That's a pretty heavy accusation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? To, like, create fear and uncertainty? That's a pretty heavy accusation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. To hinder any opportunities for future business development. And the survey results themselves, they were intentionally made inaccurate.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. To hinder any opportunities for future business development. And the survey results themselves, they were intentionally made inaccurate.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...with the purpose of evaluating the opinions of business leaders about the situation in the global and their national economies, learn about risk factors and opportunities for future business development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, it's, like, deliberately misleading? And where can you even find these "results"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, it's, like, deliberately misleading? And where can you even find these results?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: On a hidden website, actually. And in the December, not the June, issue of Forbes Kazakhstan. It's, uh, it's a whole messy situation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: On a hidden website, actually. And in the December, not the June, issue of Forbes Kazakhstan. It's, uh, it's a whole messy situation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can view the results of the study on the PwC website and in the June issue of Forbes Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Man, that just sounds like a crazy, twisted, like, disinformation campaign. What a wild ride for a simple "survey."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Man, that just sounds like a crazy, twisted, like, disinformation campaign. What a wild ride for a simple survey.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? Makes you rethink everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? Makes you rethink everything.
